message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you're willing to make a serious offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $160 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $140?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I can sell it to you for $155.
I understand you're trying to find a balance, Alice. However, $155 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $145?
